titleStmt.title: Stephen G. Burbridge to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG1922

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p:
Head Qrs Dist. Ky
Lexington July 27th 1864
Gov.

I would respectfully request you to appoint Thos. J. Elliott. (as clerk in the Provost Marshal Gens office), a Notary Public, Lieut. Elliott has lately, been mustered out of the service, he was formerly a member of my staff. I know him to be qualified, & trust worthy. We have a larger amt of Notary business at these Hd Quarters. & you will confer a favor on me by making the appointment

I am Very Respectfy
Your Obdt Servt
S. G. Burbridge Bvt. Maj Gen
Comdg Div Ky

To
His Excellency
Thos. E. Bramlette Gov.
of Kentucky
